LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.0.label: someone was euthanized
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.0.description: A prisoner or guest was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.1.label: someone was executed
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.1.description: A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood. It seemed a bit evil.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.2.label: someone killed by organ harvest
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.2.description: A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.0.label: colonist euthanized
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.0.descriptio: A colonist was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.1.label: colonist executed
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.1.descriptio: A colonist was killed in cold blood. It seemed a bit evil.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.2.label: colonist killed by organ harvest
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.2.descriptio: A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerDiedInnocent.stages.0.label: innocent prisoner died
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerDiedInnocent.stages.0.descri: One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We should be able to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.
LanguageData.KnowColonistDied.stages.0.label: colonist died
LanguageData.KnowColonistDied.stages.0.description: One of our people died. We should be able to take care of our people.
LanguageData.BondedAnimalDied.stages.0.label: bonded animal {0} died
LanguageData.BondedAnimalDied.stages.0.description: Such a tender, unique animal. This universe is evil!
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.0.label: my friend {0} died
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.0.descrip: Such a wonderful person. The universe gets darker every day.
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied.stages.0.label: my rival {0} died
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied.stages.0.descript: Serves them right. Things are looking up!
LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.0.label: my son {0} died
LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.0.description: My son is dead. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyDaughterDied.stages.0.label: my daughter {0} died
LanguageData.MyDaughterDied.stages.0.description: My daughter is dead. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyHusbandDied.stages.0.label: my husband {0} died
LanguageData.MyHusbandDied.stages.0.description: My husband is dead. I am alone...
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.0.label: my wife {0} died
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.0.description: My wife is dead. I am alone...
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.0.label: my fiance {0} died
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.0.description: My fiance died. Such a man... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyFianceeDied.stages.0.label: my fiancée {0} died
LanguageData.MyFianceeDied.stages.0.description: My fiancée died. Such a woman... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.0.label: my lover {0} died
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.0.description: My lover died. I am so alone
LanguageData.MyBrotherDied.stages.0.label: my brother {0} died
LanguageData.MyBrotherDied.stages.0.description: My brother died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MySisterDied.stages.0.label: my sister {0} died
LanguageData.MySisterDied.stages.0.description: My sister died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyGrandchildDied.stages.0.label: my grandchild {0} died
LanguageData.MyGrandchildDied.stages.0.description: My grandchild died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.0.label: my father {0} died
LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.0.description: My father died. He's gone forever...
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.0.label: my mother {0} died
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.0.description: My mother died. She's gone forever.
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.0.label: my niece {0} died
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.0.description: My niece died. Such a wonderful child.
LanguageData.MyNephewDied.stages.0.label: my nephew {0} died
LanguageData.MyNephewDied.stages.0.description: My nephew died. Such a wonderful child.
LanguageData.MyHalfSiblingDied.stages.0.label: my half-sibling {0} died
LanguageData.MyHalfSiblingDied.stages.0.description: My half-sibling died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyAuntDied.stages.0.label: my aunt {0} died
LanguageData.MyUncleDied.stages.0.label: my uncle {0} died
LanguageData.MyGrandparentDied.stages.0.label: my grandparent {0} died
LanguageData.MyCousinDied.stages.0.label: my cousin {0} died
LanguageData.MyCousinDied.stages.0.description: My cousin died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyKinDied.stages.0.label: my kin {0} died
